translation.zh: 希望你们都带了支票本

translation.zh:
-葛拉蒂丝 你女儿好吗？

translation.zh: 她遇到了一位金融家

translation.en: [Gladys] A Chinaman's…
translation.zh: 一个中国人的…

translation.zh: 威斯汀豪斯先生 《世界报》称

translation.zh:
爱迪生的新电力系统
比天然气便宜多了

translation.zh: 这会让你晚上睡不着吗？

translation.zh: 新事物总是层出不穷

translation.zh: 文森特牧师、麦考伊先生

translation.zh: 爱迪生说他只需几个月就能点亮世界

translation.zh:
了不起 但相信我
至少要花十年才能成为现实

translation.zh: 报纸上可不是这么写的

translation.zh: 仿佛坐上了飞毯

translation.zh: 我想见见他 你能安排吗？

translation.zh: 我好几年没见他了

translation.zh: 安排一顿舒适、优雅又盛大的晚餐

爱迪生连鞋带都懒得系
更不会参加社交活动

translation.zh: 也许你是对的 但总要试试

translation.zh:
彭诺耶先生在纽波特美术学院附近
发现了价格划算的地产

translation.zh:
阿伯内西的母亲过世

translation.zh: 去见总统你兴奋吗？ 当然

translation.zh: 不要讨论摩根的鼻子

translation.zh:
-他的鼻子怎么了？
-没什么？

translation.zh:
-他的鼻子到底怎么了？
-超级大！

translation.zh:
-就像有人拿了把铁锤

translation.zh: 我以为你筹到钱了 我只筹到一半

translation.zh: 摩根知道你来了吗？

translation.zh: 爱迪生先生 你要和…

translation.zh:
-什么？
-和威斯汀豪斯共进晚餐 在你回程的路上

translation.zh: 为什么谷仓是红色的？ 也许是为了让你在雪地中看见

translation.zh:
-因为红漆是最便宜的

translation.zh: 摩根想知道你的系统的实用性

translation.zh: 足够在曼哈顿买两栋小楼？

translation.zh: 总统想亲眼见一下留声机

translation.zh:
-我不知道你会来
-爱迪生夫人

translation.zh: 摩根先生 这些是我们的孩子

translation.zh:
多特和达西 很高兴见到你
我知道你的来意

translation.zh: 你还缺多少钱？你想败掉我多少钱？

translation.zh: 越多越好

translation.zh:

translation.zh: 爱迪生先生的私人秘书

translation.zh:
-摩根先生 爱迪生先生
-哪一位？他也是爱迪生先生

translation.zh: 总统现在就要见你

translation.zh: 匡格万戈坐在树顶上

translation.zh: 这是我的声音吗？

translation.zh: 我的属下告诉我你拒绝了五百万美元

translation.zh: 总统先生 非常感谢您的慷慨

translation.zh: 但您追求的科学类型令我反感

translation.zh:
-枪械总是有利可图

translation.zh: 可以夺人性命的工具

translation.zh: 但请看看这个

translation.zh:
这片曼哈顿一区
2.6平方公里的区域

translation.zh:
-将被我点亮
-你已经做到了

translation.zh: 瓶子中的星辰 温暖的亮光

translation.zh:
无味无毒 每个灯泡
可以亮13个小时

translation.zh: 比天然气安全、便宜

translation.zh: 我用直流电力系统埋线

translation.zh: 这些线还可以为您带来能源和热量

translation.zh:
我需要两栋楼来容纳
我自己建造的六个发电机

translation.zh: 这连我家都到不了

translation.zh: 摩根 我会让你变得非常富有

translation.zh: 当你回顾此刻你会想

translation.zh: “我以前怎么像个穷鬼？”

translation.zh: 那里很合适 有渡轮直通华尔街

《纽约时报》上有一个大板块
免费广告

translation.zh:
-十五万
-五十万

translation.zh: 如果你花五十万 下个世纪将属于你

translation.zh: 更亮更安全 一切都是你的

translation.zh: 皮尔庞特 听起来非常宏伟 如果我有你的财富…

-那是什么？
-这样可不礼貌

那孩子说了什么？ -他说什么？
-如果没别的事

translation.zh:
-我先告辞了 总统先生
-那孩子说了什么？

translation.zh: 你知道自己做了什么吗？

translation.zh: 拒绝永远让我能得到更多

-什么意思？

当然是爱迪生电气

translation.zh: 我不希望用它们杀人

托马斯爱迪生对毕业求职大学生

translation.zh: 音速会在传播的过程中不断下降

translation.zh: 但我相信最快速度为 每秒3.49千米

translation.zh: 你怎么都知道？

translation.zh: 这次不一样

我们直接回家 他们累了

translation.zh: 他成名前 我让他住我的地下室

如果他不梳洗干净

我们下了最后通牒后
他就自己一个人吃

translation.zh:
你想知道他的秘密？
他打造自己的现实

translation.zh: 但他怎么知道大海里有针？

translation.zh: 但他一定要做第一个吃螃蟹的人

translation.en: he'll go stalk by stalk, on a "what-do-you-know."
translation.zh:
他就一步一个脚印
抱着“没想到吧”的态度

translation.zh:
他倒是有个优点
他可能会成为世界首富

translation.en: but he doesn't give a damn about money.
translation.zh: 但他一点都不在乎钱

translation.zh: 那他在乎什么？

translation.zh: 玛丽？说话

translation.zh:
-我想测试一下阻力…
-我的发夹呢？

translation.zh:
-在你的五斗柜上
-什么是五斗柜？

translation.zh: 就是你放发夹的地方

translation.zh:
如果你想要五十万

translation.zh: 然后卖给谢尔曼将军

translation.zh: 或者我不答应你的要求

古训有云 如果你觉得

translation.zh: 如果真的如此

translation.zh: 那么各个地方

translation.zh: 我和我的伙伴将用一个罐子

translation.en: what before now has only flashed across the night sky.

-好

translation.zh: 是的！

translation.zh:
-三 二…
-二 一！

translation.zh:
他埋了30.5公里铜线

translation.zh: 炫耀是有钱人的嗜好

translation.zh: 他的电流就像打结的水管

translation.zh: 他每隔1.6公里就要放一台发电机

translation.zh:

我们的系统和他的灯泡

translation.zh: 我承认 从物理层面和现实考虑来说

translation.zh: 你的想法非常有趣

translation.zh: 我不认为这能行得通

translation.zh:
-为什么？

translation.zh:
巴黎办公室似乎觉得

translation.zh:
-你愿意为我工作吗？
-非常愿意

translation.zh:
我要扩展到12个城市
打造直流电力系统…

translation.zh: 直流电？

translation.zh: 交流电更有效率

translation.en: -[doll] Hickory, dickory dock… -Higher voltage,
translation.zh:

translation.zh: 供电距离更远 所需的铜线更少

translation.zh: 危害太大了 马达承受不了

translation.zh:
我决定给你的起薪

translation.zh: 直到你或多或少证明了自己的价值

translation.en: -A hundred dollars? -If you solve five things I can't,
translation.zh:
-一百美元？
-如果你能做五件我做不到的事

translation.en: I'll pay you $50,000, and then I'll have to fire you.
translation.zh: 我给你五万 然后我不得不解雇你

translation.zh:
特斯拉先生
欢迎来到爱迪生电气公司 我们每十天一个小发明

translation.en: and a major one every six months or so.
translation.zh: 每半年左右一个主要发明

translation.zh: 我怀疑虽然你丈夫的实验室

translation.zh: 距离你家房子不到一百米

translation.zh: 但有时就感觉距离上百公里一样

translation.en: No, a million.
translation.zh: 不 是上百万公里

translation.zh:
我尝试让他的脑袋冷静一下
但它总是一直在运转

translation.en: It's something he can't control.
translation.zh: 这是他控制不了的

translation.en: All I can do is bring him back to center.
translation.zh: 我只能让他静一静

translation.en: I've heard Mr. Edison called "the worst husband in America"
translation.zh:
我听说爱迪生被称为
“全美最差丈夫”

translation.en: on account of him sleeping in his lab on your wedding night.
translation.zh: 他在新婚之夜都睡在实验室里

translation.en: I've heard the story myself.
translation.zh: 我自己也听过这个故事

translation.zh: 在我们的新婚之夜 托马斯和我登上了奥尔巴尼…

translation.zh: 一艘船

translation.zh: 我们在尼亚加拉瀑布度过了一个星期

translation.en: I thought that one week of happiness would be enough
translation.zh: 我那时觉得一周的幸福时光

translation.en: to illuminate an entire lifetime.
translation.zh: 足以照亮一生

translation.zh: 他是风度翩翩的发明家 我为他工作

translation.zh: 我曾…

translation.zh: 我曾…

translation.zh: 什么？

translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.zh: 我以前负责…

translation.zh:
-打电报？

translation.zh: 是的 打电报

translation.en: Forgive me.
translation.zh: 请见谅

translation.zh: 他有什么爱好吗？

translation.zh: 你答应带他们去康尼岛

translation.zh: 至少散散步

translation.zh: 我保证从明天起每天散步三次

translation.zh: 这里 不如拍个照吧？

translation.zh: 慢点！

translation.zh: 这是由眼疲劳引起的神经痛

translation.zh: 只需要一副好眼镜

translation.zh: 不行 太丑了

translation.zh: 不会的 那是不可能的

translation.zh: 你确定只是这样？她最近头疼得厉害

translation.zh:
我给她留一瓶止痛药
直到她的眼睛适应

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Can you…
translation.zh: 你可以…

translation.zh: 你介意我拖欠一下出诊费吗？

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.zh: 我的儿子会喜欢你的签名

translation.zh: 天呐 真原始

translation.zh: 这需要多少钱？

translation.zh:
-他不会告诉我的
-我们需要的在这里

translation.zh:
爱迪生无法把电力
输送到1.6公里以外

translation.zh:
电流会逐渐减弱
他需要建很多直流马达

translation.en: and bury all his copper just to power one town.
translation.zh: 埋一堆铜线才能为一个小镇供电

translation.en: This country will look like a checkerboard of power plants.
translation.zh: 这个国家看起来就像发电厂的棋盘

translation.zh:
但只需要一台交流发电机
我们就可以升高电压

translation.zh:
但只需要一台交流发电机
我们就可以升高电压 可以将电输送到任何地方

translation.zh: 我们将电线串接在电线杆上

translation.zh: 铜线更少 电力更多 价格只要原来的四分之一

translation.zh: 唯一影响供电的就是距离

translation.zh: 这是你我共同的心血

translation.zh:
-如果你可以…
-我可能不行

translation.zh:
-不 别傻了
-不 它属于你

translation.zh:
-但你花了好几个小时…
-乔治 这是你的主意

translation.en: You were the instigator.
translation.zh: 你是发起人

translation.en: Shall we go for a ride?
translation.zh: 我们出去兜一圈吧？

translation.zh: “致门罗公园的奇才

translation.en: I would be delighted to send my car to deliver you
translation.zh: 我很高兴派车去接你

translation.en: to Great Barrington, Massachusetts…
translation.zh: 去马萨诸塞州大巴灵顿

translation.zh: 不！

translation.zh: 他怎么会有灯泡？

translation.zh: 美国最聪明的一群人一片沉默

translation.zh: 他使用了海勒姆的设计

translation.zh: 是海勒姆从我这里偷走的！

translation.zh:
-起诉他

translation.zh: 我是说起诉威斯汀豪斯 找个角度

translation.zh: 亲自前往巴灵顿看看

translation.zh: 十五年的心血在眼皮底下被剽窃

translation.en: is being filched from right under your eyes?
translation.zh: 你们有一丁点愤怒吗？

translation.en: Not again!
translation.zh: 下不为例！

translation.zh: 我在这里建造系统 他到处买专利

translation.en: to cobble together something to legally steal what is mine.
translation.zh: 东拼西凑 合法盗取我的心血

translation.zh:
如果灯泡是一场战争
我们就利用电动机揭发他

translation.en: We can't.
translation.zh: 我们做不到

translation.zh: 先生 他甚至都没用直流电

translation.zh: 他在用交流电？

translation.en: [woman] Mary?
translation.zh: 玛丽？

translation.zh: 我觉得我们应该再喝点茶

translation.en: Patricia?

translation.zh: 乔治威斯汀豪斯？

translation.zh:
-有什么可以帮你？
-我从托马斯爱迪生那来

translation.zh: 他想让我每1.6公里买一台发电机

translation.zh: 然后我看到《全球报》上说

translation.zh:
你的电力可以在爱迪生的基础上
便宜三分之二

translation.zh: 是计划节省

translation.zh: 而且不是“我的电力” 是“电力”

translation.zh: 我觉得对哥伦布的纳税人来说

translation.en: to go with Westinghouse Electric.
translation.zh: 用西屋电气更好

translation.zh: 我不想竞争 我只想授权我的系统

translation.zh:
-他的灯泡比较好
-为什么不竞争？

translation.en: By now he knows. Edison knows, I promise you.
translation.zh: 我向你保证爱迪生已经知道了

translation.en: [Frank] The man doesn't care about getting it right, just about getting it.
translation.zh: 他不在乎什么是对的 他只在乎结果

translation.en: [Westinghouse] But he doesn't respond.
translation.zh: 但他没有回复

translation.en: [Edison] Look, Westinghouse will never have a complete system.
translation.zh:
听着 威斯汀豪斯
永远不会有完整的系统

translation.zh:
-他甚至连缝纫机都启动不了
-但我解决不了那个问题

translation.zh:
与其再次转换电流使其与
换向器一起工作

translation.zh: 我会用两个或多个电源电路

translation.zh: 来分相传输交流电

translation.zh: 你应该去改良直流发电机的换向器

translation.zh: 好的 我已经做了

translation.zh: 我已经做了你要求的一切 但你犯了一个错误

translation.en: -What? -Direct current may be fine for cities
translation.zh:
-什么？
-当建筑物都聚集在一起

translation.zh: 直流电同样适用于城市 但贵国大部分地区都很空旷

translation.zh:
-只有高电压才能跨越距离
-这是什么？

translation.zh:
-你没有从长期去考虑
-拿这个吧

translation.zh:
你可以掌握这项技术
我可以为你建造高效马达

translation.zh: 你有尝试过吗？

translation.zh: 没有

translation.zh: 在我的脑海中已几乎成型

translation.zh: 很多人觉得自己文思泉涌

translation.zh:
-让我试试
-不 因为我不能重新开始

translation.zh:
我收到了密歇根的订单
还有很多媒体在等我

translation.en: Do what you were hired to do.
translation.zh: 做你应该做的事情

translation.zh: 你不会兑现有关薪酬的承诺了？

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Well, you said $50,000.
translation.zh:
-你在说什么？
-你说了五万

translation.zh:
-你对我的努力不满意吗？
-我不会付你五万

translation.en: That was a joke.
translation.zh: 那是个玩笑

translation.zh: 椰子纤维、角屑和钓鱼线

translation.zh: 软木、赛璐珞、亚麻 白金、铁、镍、铜、钢

translation.zh: 我们多年在一直在四处搜索

translation.zh: 尝试了成千上万种组合

translation.zh:
然后乔治威斯汀豪斯看到了我的做法
就进行了剽窃

translation.zh: 你做什么都会遇到这种小人 但你要离他们远远的

translation.zh:
-所以就是这么回事？
-制图师在地图里放入错误的信息

translation.en: to see if anyone else is copying them.
translation.zh: 检验是否有人抄袭他们

translation.en: I don't have that luxury. I can't invent streets to lead the world down.
translation.zh:
我没那么奢侈 我不能让我的发明
使整个世界暗下来

translation.en: Otherwise we all end up in the dark.
translation.zh: 否则我们都会活在黑暗之中

translation.zh:
很好 记住尽可能多地
记录下他的侵权行为

translation.zh: 爱迪生先生 谢谢你的礼物

translation.en: Did I mention that his system's lethal?
translation.zh: 我说过他的系统危害很大吗？

translation.en: You reach out and touch
translation.zh: 如果你伸手去触摸

translation.zh: 门把或扶手 你就成为了电路

translation.en: Just to be clear on that point…
translation.zh: 只要说明这一点就好了

translation.en: Well, you die.
translation.zh: 你会死的

translation.en: With DC current, you can reach out and touch anything
translation.zh: 用直流电 你可以徒手

translation.en: at any stage of the line with your bare hands.
translation.zh: 在任何阶段触摸任何东西

translation.zh:
安全、有效 还冠名爱迪生
所以非常美观

translation.zh: 政府已经在尝试

translation.zh: 让我去发明武器

translation.zh:
但我不会用我的脑袋去发明

translation.zh: 你们想要那些东西可以去匹兹堡

translation.zh: 你是说威斯汀豪斯想要害人？

translation.zh: 这就是他对你的看法

translation.zh:
就今天的报纸内容发表声明
驳斥他的指控

translation.zh: 我不想搅和这个事情

translation.zh: 大家欢呼吧

translation.zh: 我们倾尽全力用灯泡来抓到他的把柄

-那是我的

translation.zh: 交流电则是双向流动

translation.en: Water. That doesn't sound so dangerous.
translation.zh: 水 听起来并不是那么危险

translation.en: -Not until you drown. -[crowd chuckles]
translation.zh: 直到你溺水才会明白

translation.en: Why don't you use Mr. Westinghouse's current?
translation.zh: 你为什么不使用威斯汀豪斯的电流？

translation.en: I don't like it. You think it's dangerous.
translation.zh:
-我不喜欢
-你觉得它很危险

translation.en: Yes, I do.
translation.zh: 我的确这么认为

translation.en: Suppose you took this…
translation.zh: 假设你把这个

translation.en: wicked Westinghouse current…
translation.zh: 邪恶的威斯汀豪斯电流

translation.en: the one that is going to be used on Mr. Kemmler here…
translation.zh: 用在凯姆勒先生身上

translation.en: Now, suppose you kept it up for five or six minutes.
translation.zh: 通电大概五到六分钟

translation.en: At 1,500 volts,
translation.zh: 电压为一千五百伏特

translation.en: how long would it take before he would feel the heat?
translation.zh: 他多久才会感觉到热量？

translation.en: Well, the temperature might rise
translation.zh: 温度可以会比正常体温

translation.en: four or five degrees above normal and continue until he was mummified.
translation.zh: 升高四到五度 然后继续 直到他变成木乃伊

translation.en: And this wouldn't cause considerable pain?
translation.zh: 这样不会令他痛苦不堪？

translation.en: -It would not. -How do you know?
translation.zh:
-不会的
-你怎么知道？

translation.en: Because I personally observed such electricity
translation.zh: 因为我亲自观察过

translation.en: being used to execute a thousand-pound horse.
translation.zh: 450公斤的马被这种电流电死

translation.en: -And did the horse feel pain? -Well, he didn't mention it.
translation.zh:
-马有感到疼痛吗？
-如果有的话 它也没提

translation.en: [lawyer] Now, Mr. Edison, there is a great degree of feeling
translation.zh: 爱迪生先生 你和威斯汀豪斯先生

translation.en: between you and Mr. Westinghouse.
translation.zh: 之间有什么过节吗？

translation.en: [Edison] I do not dislike Mr. Westinghouse.
translation.zh: 我没有不喜欢威斯汀豪斯先生

translation.en: [lawyer] There's a contest between you two, isn't there?
translation.zh: 你们两之间有竞争 不是吗？

translation.en: That is not what this is about.
translation.zh: 这不是重点

translation.en: I've been asked as a dispassionate scientist
translation.zh: 作为一个冷静的科学家 我被问到

translation.en: to advise on the simple question of whether death by electricity
translation.zh: 用电执行死刑是否违反

translation.en: is a violation of the Eighth Amendment and is cruel and unusual.
translation.zh:
《第八修正案》的规定以及
是否残忍和不同寻常

translation.en: In my expert opinion, the only humane method of execution
translation.zh:
从我的专业角度来看
唯一人道的执行方法

translation.en: is Westinghouse alternating current.
translation.zh: 就是威斯汀豪斯交流电

translation.en: [lawyer] Your Honor, Mr. Edison knows that any current over 30 amperes--
translation.zh:
法官大人 爱迪生先生知道
任何超过30安培的电流…

translation.en: Milliamperes. If you're gonna interrupt, do so in the proper denominations.
translation.zh:
是毫安 如果你想打断别人
至少做出合适的陈述

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 谢谢 法官大人

translation.en: -[judge] It's my honor. -[gavel raps]
translation.zh: 荣幸之至

translation.en: [judge] All right, that's all I need to hear.
translation.zh: 好吧 就听到这里吧

translation.en: [Edison] What do you two lowlifes want, huh?
translation.zh: 你们两个小家伙想要什么？

translation.en: [Westinghouse] Mr. Edison. Mr. Edison.
translation.zh: 爱迪生先生

translation.en: [Edison] Huh?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Now look…
translation.zh: 现在 听着…

translation.en: [man] I thought you'd leave before I had a chance.
translation.zh: 我以为我没机会了

translation.en: -Mr. Edison, can I get your autograph? -Uh, yeah, sure, I…
translation.zh:
-爱迪生先生 可以帮我签名吗？
-当然 我…

translation.en: William, do you mind?
translation.zh: 威廉 你介意吗？

translation.en: [man] Use this.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: I should warn you, there's one thing that always beats justice.
translation.zh:
我该警告你 有一样东西
可以永远压倒正义

translation.en: Money?
translation.zh: 金钱？

translation.en: Fame.
translation.zh: 名誉

translation.en: Oh, is that a New Model Army revolver?
translation.zh: 那是新型陆军左轮手枪吗？

translation.en: What a lovely machine that is.
translation.zh: 真是一把好枪

translation.en: -Do you know how it works? -You want me to show you?
translation.zh:
-你知道它的原理吗？
-你想让我演示给你看吗？

translation.en: Oh, I didn't mean how it fires. I simply meant how it works.
translation.zh: 我不是说如何开枪 单纯指它的原理

translation.en: It's quite a device. You should have a look.
translation.zh: 你应该看看它的装置

translation.en: You see, they designed the cylinder so the hammer
translation.zh: 你看他们设计了弹巢 所以击锤

translation.en: doesn't have to sit in an empty chamber.
translation.zh: 不必留在空膛室内

translation.en: So I could shoot you six times instead of five.
translation.zh: 我可以朝你连开六枪而不是五枪

translation.en: -Well, I suppose. -[horse whinnies]
translation.zh: 我想是的

translation.en: [lawyer] They both lied on the stand.
translation.zh: 他们在庭上都撒了谎

translation.en: If you're gonna take your shot, now is the last time to fire.
translation.zh: 如果你要开枪 现在就是最后的机会

translation.en: Sometimes we have to work outside of the rules to get what's right.
translation.zh: 有时我们必须违反规则来伸张正义

translation.en: It would be nice if we didn't have to.
translation.zh: 如果我们不必如此就太好了

translation.en: Wouldn't it?
translation.zh: 不是吗？

translation.en: -This doesn't make you like him. -Hmm.
translation.zh:
-但即使这样做 你也不会像他那样
-嗯

translation.en: So, what will it be?
translation.zh: 那会像什么？

translation.en: In my bad ear, it sounded extraordinary.
translation.zh: 很动听 我耳朵不太好使

translation.en: [Dash] Father…
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: [Westinghouse] "The apparatus consists of a stationary engine,
translation.zh: 该装置包含一个固定引擎

translation.en: a Westinghouse alternating dynamo capable of generating 3,000 volts.
translation.zh: 一个威斯汀豪斯交流发电机 可以产生三千伏特电压

translation.en: Wood chair with headrest."
translation.zh: 带有靠枕的木椅

translation.en: -[Edison] Where did you get that? -I'm sending them to the paper.
translation.zh:
你从哪来弄到的？
我要把它们寄给报社

translation.en: [Edison] Those letters are stolen. You can't publish them.
translation.zh: 这些信是偷来的 你不能发表

translation.en: -Why not? -Because they're private correspondences.
translation.zh:
-为什么不行？
-因为都是私人信件

translation.en: Mr. Edison, if you say something about me or my company again,
translation.zh:
爱迪生先生 如果你再对
我和我的公司说三道四

translation.en: I would ask that you tell the truth.
translation.zh: 请说真话

translation.en: That would be the decent thing to do.
translation.zh: 这样才够体面

translation.en: Wouldn't it?
translation.zh: 不是吗？

translation.en: -[Edison] Why didn't you burn the letters? -[Brown] They were from Thomas Edison.
translation.zh:
-你怎么没把信烧掉？
-这是托马斯爱迪生的来信

translation.en: I don't think you appreciate that this chair is something
translation.zh: 我觉得你没有意识到

translation.en: to be proud of and remembered for.
translation.zh: 这把椅子值得你骄傲和铭记

translation.en: I don't even know how much electricity you need to use.
translation.zh: 我甚至不知道你需要多少电量

translation.en: -You said 1,500 volts. -I said I think 1,500 volts.
translation.zh:
-你说一千五百伏特
-我说我觉得是一千五

translation.en: But if all the water in his body evaporates, then he may ignite.
translation.zh:
但如果他体内的水分蒸发了
然后他可能会烧起来

translation.en: -So we lower the amount. -Then you slowly roast him to death.
translation.zh:
-那我们就降低电量
-那你就是慢慢将他烤死

translation.en: Listen. You must listen to me. What you're going to do is wrong.
translation.zh: 你必须听我说 你要做的事情是错的

translation.en: Now you said that it's inevitable and somebody else will do it.
translation.zh:
现在你说这事已不可避免
你不做也会有别人去做

translation.en: But just because somebody else is gonna do it doesn't mean that you have to.
translation.zh:
但不能因为会有其他人会去做
你就必须去做

translation.en: The State thanks you for your expert opinion and your help.
translation.zh: 联邦感谢你提供的专业建议和帮助

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 干什么？

translation.en: -It's not my place to say. -Say it.
translation.zh:
-我没资格这么说
-说吧

translation.en: You said you'd never build a device that would kill anyone.
translation.zh:
你说过你永远不会
造出一个杀人的设备

translation.en: I make something impossible, and they rip it away from me,
translation.zh:
我把不可能变成现实
他们却从我这里剽窃成果

translation.en: so I do it again and they do it again.
translation.zh: 于是我重头来过 他们故技重施

translation.en: And again. And again.
translation.zh: 不断反复

translation.en: This isn't like everything else.
translation.zh: 这和其他事不一样

translation.en: This is everything else.
translation.zh: 这就是一切

translation.en: Our future is not gonna be paved with bricks but with copper.
translation.zh:
我们的未来不是由砖瓦堆砌的
而是铜线

translation.en: Automation, transportation, communication, and the man that controls that current
translation.zh: 自动化、运输、通讯 谁掌握了电流

translation.en: controls that future.
translation.zh: 谁就掌握了未来

translation.en: [Samuel] But you know Westinghouse is right.
translation.zh: 但你知道威斯汀豪斯是对的

translation.en: You don't actually believe that a few accidents
translation.zh: 你不会真心相信几次意外

translation.en: rule out the viability of his current.
translation.zh: 就能毁掉他的电流

translation.en: -You just don't want to lose. -I have merely amplified
translation.zh:
-你只是不想输
-我只是放大了

translation.en: what no one else was willing to take seriously.
translation.zh: 没人认真看待的事情

translation.en: What you did was run him over with a 12-ton train.
translation.zh:
不 你是用一辆12吨重的火车
从他身上碾过去

translation.en: Oh, well, he's the one that's supposed to only make brakes,
translation.zh: 他本该好好做他的刹车系统

translation.en: so, who's to blame here?
translation.zh: 这又能怪谁呢？

translation.en: Switch tonight, and you win.
translation.zh: 今晚换系统 你还能赢

translation.en: His current kills people.
translation.zh: 他的电流能杀人

translation.en: Only because you said it will!
translation.zh: 只是因为你说会

translation.en: Listen, I either stop complaining about scavengers in my garden
translation.zh:
听着 如果我的院子里进了秃鹫
我要么选择停止抱怨

translation.en: or build a wall so damn high that people will never even dare to scale it.
translation.zh: 要么筑起高墙让别人永远不敢攀爬

translation.en: You are the smartest man I know.
translation.zh: 你是我认识最聪明的人

translation.en: Beyond building miracles out of thin air, I was most impressed by your principles.
translation.zh: 除了凭空创造出奇迹 我最佩服的是你的原则

translation.en: You didn't invent the incandescent. People just think you did.
translation.zh:
你没有发明白炽灯
只是人们都觉得是你

translation.en: Let me welcome you to the reality of how things come into existence.
translation.zh: 我欢迎你认清事物存在的现实

translation.en: We all contribute. That's what invention is.
translation.zh: 发明就是这样 我们都有贡献

translation.en: The salt. The grain. The heat. The heart.
translation.zh: 盐巴、谷物、热量、用心

translation.en: But only one man makes the bread rise.
translation.zh: 但只有一个人让面包发起来

translation.en: That's the one that puts it all together
translation.zh: 就是他整合了一切

translation.en: and makes it taste so damn good that people will go out there
translation.zh: 让面包变得如此美味

translation.en: and hand over their hard-won dollars to buy it.
translation.zh: 人们才愿意用赚来的钱去买它

translation.en: Mr. Edison, I want you to succeed. I do.
translation.zh: 爱迪生先生 我真心希望你成功

translation.en: But you have to switch tonight, or you'll die as P.T. Barnum
translation.zh:
但你今晚必须换系统
不然你就会像巴纳姆一样死去

translation.en: rather than Sir Isaac Newton.
translation.zh: 而不是像艾萨克牛顿爵士那样

translation.en: [Upton] Though he may be unfamiliar to you,
translation.zh: 尽管你们可能对他不熟悉

translation.en: his studies have demonstrated an understanding of electrical matters
translation.zh: 但他的研究展现了对电的理解

translation.en: unlike anyone I have ever known, with respect to the assembled.
translation.zh:
即使算上在座各位
也是我前所未见的

translation.en: Gentlemen and lady, Nikola Tesla.
translation.zh:
女士们 先生们
欢迎尼古拉斯特斯拉

translation.en: [Tesla] Straight to our ultimate question,
translation.zh: 直接切入我们的终极问题

translation.en: yes or no…
translation.zh: 交流电

translation.en: can alternating currents operate a motor?
translation.zh: 能不能驱动马达？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 可以

translation.en: Now anyone who builds an alternating system
translation.zh: 任何能构建交流电系统的人

translation.en: will be able to do what Edison can for only a third of the cost.
translation.zh:
都能做到爱迪生所做之事
而且成本也要三分之一

translation.en: In figure two of my polyphase system, the armature coils
translation.zh: 在我的多相系统的图二中

translation.en: are shown in a more advanced position.
translation.zh: 电枢线圈显示在更高级的位置

translation.en: 2-A illustrates the corresponding magnetic condition…
translation.zh: 2-A显示了相应的磁条件…

translation.en: Synchronous motor obtained by winding a ring
translation.zh: 通过缠绕带有磁极突起的叠片环

translation.en: provided with pole projections…
translation.zh: 获得同步电动机…

translation.en: The induction is of an ideal character,
translation.zh: 这种电磁感应处于理想状态

translation.en: being always maintained at its maximum action.
translation.zh: 可以一直保持最大动作

translation.en: Mr. Tesla, have you actually built the motor to test your theories?
translation.zh:
特斯拉先生 你有真正制造出
这种马达来测试你的理论吗？

translation.en: But they are not theories. No, I have not built it.
translation.zh: 但它们不是理论 我还没有制造出来

translation.en: [man] But that would prove your beliefs.
translation.zh: 但那可以证明你的看法

translation.en: But they are not beliefs, and it is absolutely immaterial to me
translation.zh: 但它们不是看法 对我而言

translation.en: whether I run the motor in my mind or in a shop,
translation.zh: 在我脑海里还是工厂里运行并不重要

translation.en: for I have built it already in my imagination, and it is perfect.
translation.zh: 我已经用想象构建完成 完美无瑕

translation.en: -[man] Are you serious? -Almost always.
translation.zh:
-你是认真的吗？
-一直都是

translation.en: Hello. I'm George Westinghouse.
translation.zh: 你好 我是乔治威斯汀豪斯

translation.en: -George Westinghouse? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
-乔治威斯汀豪斯？
-是的

translation.en: An engine that compresses air into a tank
translation.zh: 用引擎将空气压缩

translation.en: which is taken via pipe to each brake on the train,
translation.zh: 通过管道输送到火车的每个刹车

translation.en: allowing them to operate simultaneously.
translation.zh: 让它们同步运作

translation.en: Smart design.
translation.zh: 聪明的设计

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 请坐

translation.en: I think this entire room is slanted two degrees.
translation.zh: 我觉得整个房间倾斜了两度

translation.en: I sincerely appreciate you taking the time to meet with me.
translation.zh: 我真心感激你抽出时间来见我

translation.en: Are… Are you going somewhere?
translation.zh: 你这是要去哪里？

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: -This is it? -[Tesla] It's Niagara Falls.
translation.zh:
-就是这个？
-这是尼亚加拉瀑布

translation.en: [Westinghouse] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: And ever since my school days, I have pictured in my imagination
translation.zh: 在学生时代 我就用想象刻画

translation.en: a big wheel spinning out lightning.
translation.zh: 一个巨大的轮子旋转出闪电

translation.en: Did you know that when I first came to this country, I worked for Mr. Edison?
translation.zh:
你知道我第一次到这个国家时
我为爱迪生先生工作吗？

translation.en: -I did not. -Tea?
translation.zh:
-我不知道
-喝茶吗？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: I fixed two of his DC generators in one night,
translation.zh: 我一晚上修好他的两台直流发电机

translation.en: and he called me a damn good man.
translation.zh: 我觉得我很厉害

translation.en: So, why did he not treat me that way?
translation.zh: 但他为什么没有好好待我？

translation.en: I quit. Tried my own company and was deceived.
translation.zh: 我辞职了 自己开公司被骗

translation.en: Who was I? Some immigrant.
translation.zh: 我是谁？一个移民

translation.en: So I took the only job I could find. Digging a ditch.
translation.zh:
我就去做了我唯一能找到的工作
挖沟渠

translation.en: The men laughed at my fine clothes, but at the end of the day, I had $2.
translation.zh:
他们嘲笑我的精美服饰
但一天下来 我只赚到两块

translation.en: What was the ditch to be used for?
translation.zh: 那个沟渠是用来做什么的？

translation.en: Edison Electric.
translation.zh: 爱迪生电气

translation.en: It felt like digging my own grave.
translation.zh: 我就像在自掘坟墓

translation.en: If Mr. Edison succeeds, he will set us back so far, we may never recover.
translation.zh:
如果爱迪生成功了
他会大大耽误我们 无法挽回

translation.en: The Fair must be alternating. It must be my motor.
translation.zh: 博览会必须使用交流电 必须是我的马达

translation.en: I have watched as the world talks of Chicago as a symbol,
translation.zh: 我看到全世界把芝加哥作为象征

translation.en: a "City of Light."
translation.zh: 称之为“光之城”

translation.en: All cities will have light in your lifetime,
translation.zh:
在你有生之年
所有城市都会普及电灯

translation.en: but harnessing the power of Niagara, that is to see our future.
translation.zh:
但利用尼亚加拉的力量
我们可以看见未来

translation.en: The Falls? I'm here to talk about Chicago.
translation.zh: 瀑布？我在说芝加哥

translation.en: Think beyond Chicago.
translation.zh: 放大你的格局

translation.en: Energy is as fundamental as food, as water, as air.
translation.zh:
能源就像食物、空气和水一样
是必需品

translation.en: You can… You cannot say that only those with money can eat
translation.zh: 你不能说只有有钱人才可以吃饭

translation.en: or can breathe.
translation.zh: 或呼吸

translation.en: The Falls will light up the Eastern Seaboard.
translation.zh: 是的 瀑布将点亮东海岸

translation.en: There is a great fortune to be made, and I covet a very nice walking stick
translation.zh:
其中有很多利益可图
我渴望有一个极好的拐杖

translation.en: I saw on 63rd and Madison, but Niagara is the proof
translation.zh:
我在63街站和麦迪逊见过的那种
但是尼亚加拉就是证明

translation.en: that one day we may detach power from profit.
translation.zh: 有一天我们可以把能源从利益中切割

translation.en: That is how you truly win.
translation.zh: 那才是真正的胜利

translation.en: Hmm.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: -How do I know you will not cheat me? -Well,
translation.zh:
-我怎么知道你不会骗我？
-好吧

translation.en: you don't.
translation.zh: 你不会知道

translation.en: But the fact is, Mr. Tesla, I need your motor.
translation.zh:
但事实是 特斯拉先生
我需要你的马达

translation.en: I may be able to light up the Fair, but I still can't move a machine.
translation.zh:
我或许能点亮博览会
但我不能让设备运转

translation.en: If we cannot reach an agreement today, my company will die
translation.zh:
如果我们今天无法达成协议
我的公司就完了

translation.en: right here in your hotel room.
translation.zh: 就在你的酒店房间里

translation.en: But if it does perish, so might your dream of harnessing power from Niagara.
translation.zh:
但如果它完了
你的尼亚加拉梦也就完了

translation.en: So, do we have a deal?
translation.zh: 所以我们成交吗？

translation.en: Five thousand.
translation.zh: 五千

translation.en: One thousand.
translation.zh: 一千

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -I was wondering about one thing. -Oh, I'm sure there were many.
translation.zh:
-我在想一件事
-一定有很多件

translation.en: I was gonna invite you to dinner again,
translation.zh: 我本想再请你共进晚餐

translation.en: but I suppose now is as good a time as any.
translation.zh: 但我想现在也是个好机会

translation.en: You want to know what was in the 13-hour bulb?
translation.zh: 你想知道13小时灯泡的事？

translation.en: -I know how it works. -Yeah, I know you do.
translation.zh:
-我知道它的原理
-我知道你知道

translation.en: I only wondered what it felt like.
translation.zh: 我只是好奇那是什么感觉

translation.en: -Pardon? -The bulb.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-灯泡

translation.en: When you knew.
translation.zh: 当你知道你成功了

translation.en: What was the feeling in that moment?
translation.zh: 那时是什么感觉？

translation.en: I can't tell you. I mean…
translation.zh: 我不能告诉你 我是说…

translation.en: It's impossible to describe the feeling because it was impossible.
translation.zh:
我说不上来那是一种什么感觉
因为不可能说得出来

translation.en: Years of work. Ten thousand different filaments.
translation.zh: 我们研究多年 用了上万种灯丝

translation.en: When the thread went in the bulb, as usual,
translation.zh: 当灯丝进入灯泡 像往常一样

translation.en: we placed our bets and the generator sputtered to life
translation.zh: 我们开始下注 发电机开始运转

translation.en: and the ball began to glow, we didn't expect anything but another failure.
translation.zh:
灯泡开始变亮
我们以为这是另一场失败

translation.en: Then something started to happen.
translation.zh: 然后就开始不一样了

translation.en: See, our best filament only lasted ten minutes,
translation.zh: 我们最好的灯丝只持续了十分钟

translation.en: and this fluke was rounding 20,
translation.zh: 而这次却有20分钟

translation.en: so people started to chatter.
translation.zh: 人们开始喋喋不休

translation.en: And 30 minutes, 40 minutes, an hour, two hours.
translation.zh:
然后30分钟 再到40分钟
一小时、两小时

translation.en: Then people started to shout.
translation.zh: 然后人们开始兴奋大吼

translation.en: And remember, we hadn't got past ten minutes.
translation.zh:
请记住 我们以前的灯泡
从未撑过十分钟

translation.en: The boys were climbing up the walls, tearing their hair out, and…
translation.zh: 小伙子们兴奋异常 激动不已

translation.en: Because it was impossible.
translation.zh: 因为这是不可能的

translation.en: Seven hours. Eight hours. Nine.
translation.zh: 七小时、八小时、九小时

translation.en: We were silent when we hit ten.
translation.zh: 到了十小时 一片沉默

translation.en: Just sat around that glowing bubble,
translation.zh: 大家围坐在发亮的灯泡前

translation.en: drunk on our own magic, staring at it like it…
translation.zh: 沉醉于这个神奇时刻 盯着它

translation.en: I don't know, like it was the baby Jesus playing Mozart.
translation.zh:
我不知道 仿佛它是一个
正在弹奏莫扎特曲子的圣婴

translation.en: After 13 and a half hours, the glass cracked, and I knew it.
translation.zh: 13个半小时后 灯泡碎了 我知道

translation.en: The world would never be the same.
translation.zh: 世界将会发生巨变

translation.en: I'm working on something now, something so new that…
translation.zh: 我正在研究全新的发明

translation.en: people will forget that my name was ever associated with electricity.
translation.zh:
人们会忘记
我的名字曾经与电紧密相连

translation.en: I wonder if you know what it is yet.
translation.zh: 我在想你是否知道那是什么

translation.en: You know, I think the solution is…
translation.zh: 我觉得解决之道是

translation.en: to divide the cost of the fence.
translation.zh: 均摊围墙的费用

translation.en: Or you could not build a fence at all.
translation.zh: 或者你根本不去建造围墙

translation.en: Your garden would be twice as big.
translation.zh: 那样你的花园会大两倍

translation.en: Wouldn't it, Tom?
translation.zh: 对吗 托马斯？

translation.en: If nothing else, a pleasure.
translation.zh: 如果没别的事 我先告辞

translation.en: Enjoy the fair, George.
translation.zh: 乔治 享受博览会吧

translation.en: [Tesla] We build monuments to speak to the future, to say, "We were here.
translation.zh:
我们建起纪念碑 告诉后世
“我们曾在这里

translation.en: We have lived."
translation.zh: 我们曾经活过”

translation.en: Our true legacy isn't what we build up to the heavens
translation.zh: 真正的遗产不是高耸入云的建筑

translation.en: or carve deep into stone.
translation.zh: 不是石头上的雕纹

translation.en: Rocks will crumble,
translation.zh: 石头终会粉碎

translation.en: paper disintegrates,
translation.zh: 纸张会脆化

translation.en: and bone turns to powder.
translation.zh: 骨头会化为粉末

translation.en: Only that which isn't in the physical realm
translation.zh: 只有脱离了物质范畴

translation.en: and reaches in both directions can be eternal.
translation.zh: 可以双向交流的事物才能永恒

translation.en: Our ideas.
translation.zh: 我们的创意

translation.en: They are what we leave behind.
translation.zh: 是我们留下的珍宝

translation.en: And only they are what can push us forward.
translation.zh: 也只有它们才是推动我们前进的动力

translation.zh: 安妮塔 舞厅 马祖卡

translation.zh:
由屋大维阿诺雅内兹
为我们演奏吉他
